title: Tax authorities alert foreign tech firms of GST to avert nasty surprises - Economic Times
content: Tax authorities alert foreign tech firms of GST to avert nasty surprises  Economic Times
description: An email, in the nature of an information flyer, is being sent to these offshore business-to-customer (B2C) entities by the Bangalore nodal office of Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs which administers the common indirect tax which came into effect from July 1, 2017.
